00040 typedef struct opennsl_vxlan_vpn_config_s {
00041     uint32 flags;                       
00042     opennsl_vpn_t vpn;                  
00043     uint32 vnid;                        
00044     uint8 pkt_pri;                      
00045     uint8 pkt_cfi;                      
00046     uint16 egress_service_tpid;         
00047     opennsl_vlan_t egress_service_vlan; 
00048     opennsl_multicast_t broadcast_group; 
00049     opennsl_multicast_t unknown_unicast_group; 
00050     opennsl_multicast_t unknown_multicast_group; 
00051     opennsl_vlan_protocol_packet_ctrl_t protocol_pkt; 
00052     opennsl_vlan_t vlan;                
00053     opennsl_gport_t match_port_class;   
00054 } opennsl_vxlan_vpn_config_t;

00184 typedef enum opennsl_vxlan_port_match_e {
00185     OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_MATCH_INVALID = 0, 
00186     OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_MATCH_NONE = 1,  
00187     OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_MATCH_PORT = 2,  
00188     OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_MATCH_PORT_VLAN = 3, 
00189     OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_MATCH_VN_ID = 7, 
00190 } opennsl_vxlan_port_match_t;
00191 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00192 #endif

00194 #if defined(INCLUDE_L3)
00195 #define OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_WITH_ID          (1 << 0)   
00197 #define OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_NETWORK          (1 << 2)   
00199 #define OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_EGRESS_TUNNEL    (1 << 7)   
00201 #define OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_SERVICE_TAGGED   (1 << 8)   
00202 #define OPENNSL_VXLAN_PORT_MULTICAST        (1 << 19)  
00204 #endif
00205 #if defined(INCLUDE_L3)

00207 typedef struct opennsl_vxlan_port_s {
00208     opennsl_gport_t vxlan_port_id;      
00209     uint32 flags;                       
00210     uint16 int_pri;                     
00211     uint8 pkt_pri;                      
00212     uint8 pkt_cfi;                      
00213     uint16 egress_service_tpid;         
00214     opennsl_vlan_t egress_service_vlan; 
00215     uint16 mtu;                         
00216     opennsl_gport_t match_port;         
00217     opennsl_vxlan_port_match_t criteria; 
00218     opennsl_vlan_t match_vlan;          
00219     opennsl_vlan_t match_inner_vlan;    
00220     opennsl_gport_t egress_tunnel_id;   
00221     opennsl_gport_t match_tunnel_id;    
00222     opennsl_if_t egress_if;             
00223 } opennsl_vxlan_port_t;
00224 /* __doxy_func_body_end__ */
00225 #endif
